meanings.definition: A Japanese mustard green with serrated leaves.
meanings.sent1: The mizuna added a unique flavor to the salad.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the peppery taste of mizuna in my stir-fry dishes.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to hide behind the mizuna leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sharp and unexpected as a bite of mizuna.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of mizuna brightened up the plate.

meanings.definition: A type of leafy green vegetable commonly used in salads.
meanings.sent1: The fresh mizuna leaves made the salad crunchy.
meanings.sent2: Mizuna is a great addition to any healthy salad.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the mizuna from the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as refreshing as a bite of crisp mizuna.
meanings.sent5: The mizuna leaves danced in the breeze, adding beauty to the garden.
